title: Honoring Joseph and Anna Buttaccio upon their heroic efforts in saving the life of a car crash victim
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE RESOLUTION honoring Joseph and Anna Buttaccio of Newark, New
York, upon their heroic efforts in saving the life of a car crash victim

WHEREAS,  It  is  the  sense  of  this Legislative Body to recognize the
caring concern and heroic acts of those exemplary individuals  who  take
prompt and appropriate action in emergency situations; and
  WHEREAS,  Attendant to such concern and fully in accord with its long-
standing traditions, it is the intent of this Legislative Body to  honor
Joseph and Anna Buttaccio of Newark, New York, upon their heroic efforts
in saving the life of a car crash victim; and
  WHEREAS, Joseph and Anna Buttaccio will be honored on Saturday, Novem-
ber  6,  2010, by the Wayne County Firemen's Association as the Citizens
of the Year for their actions; and
  WHEREAS, On June 10, 2010, Joseph and Anna Buttaccio  of  Newark  were
just passing by on Route 31 in the Town of Palmyra when they saw a head-
on  collision  between  two  vehicles, and one of the cars then left the
roadway and burst into flames; disregarding risk to their own lives, the
Buttaccios reached into the burning wreck  and  dragged  the  driver  to
safety; and
  WHEREAS,  Suffering  minor  burn  injuries themselves, Joseph and Anna
Buttaccio saw that the driver was air-lifted to Strong  Hospital,  after
he sustained burns and a traumatic head injury; and
  WHEREAS,  These  valorous  acts by Joseph and Anna Buttaccio are to be
highly acclaimed; and
  WHEREAS, In their spontaneous and valiant  actions,  Joseph  and  Anna
Buttaccio demonstrated their character and compassion for the welfare of
others, exemplifying the best qualities inherent in our citizens of this
great  Empire State; they are true assets to society; now, therefore, be
it
  RESOLVED, That this Legislative Body pause  in  its  deliberations  to
honor  Joseph  and Anna Buttaccio of Newark, New York, upon their heroic
efforts in saving the life of a car crash victim; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to Joseph and Anna Buttaccio.
